name: Bernard Arnault Sauve La France
summary:
Bernard Arnault Sauve La France is a satirical work and is not intended to explain to anyone how to get out of the crisis linked to Covid-19 (except perhaps Bernard Arnault). 
 
All amounts included in the game are from sources found as of April 29, 2020 and are highly subject to change. Bernard Arnault's fortune in particular, being largely based on stock market values, fluctuates widely. 
 
The orders of magnitude, on the other hand, do not change.
